name: Submarine Seeker (nichi13)
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2021, Submarine Seeker is a 2D adventure game following the jam's theme "Lost and Found". The objective of the game is to navigate underwater in a submarine to collect treasure, but oxygen supply is limited so players must stay alert! As the player descends further into the water, the environment becomes darker and the submarine light must be utilized to find treasure. This game was created in 48 hours, and I was the lead designer and environment artist. As the designer, I created the game's concept and designed player constraints and level design. 

Credits:

Abby Pearson

Nicole Stocks

Ryan Chang

Walker McDonald

William Lacey
